title: Decks*, Package Concierge, Energy Star Whirlpool Washer and Dryer
map_address: 602 Terry Ave N near Valley and Terry
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 872 Sq.
Helm is a boutique tower in South Lake Union with inspiring, unobstructed Lake Union views.
Perched atop Google's new campus, Helm is a modern skyward escape at the edge of it all.

Central Air Conditioning, Ample Storage + Walk-in Closets, Polished Quartz countertops and backsplashes, Virtual Tour of Our Homes: https://youtu.be/tUKnO7P6AOw, Luxury hardwood style floors, Energy Star Whirlpool Washer and Dryer, City + Space Needle Views*, Decks*, Solar Shades, KitchenAid Stainless Steel Appliances, Unobstructed views of Lake Union*

Sun Deck, Bike Storage, Dog Relief/Run Area, Outdoor Kitchen, Outdoor Fire Pit, Package Concierge, Views Of Lake Union Like No Other, Board/Meeting Room, Billiards and Shuffleboard Area, Rooftop Lounge/Club Room, Rooftop Deck, Pet Relief Area
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 deposit per pet (refundable).
Please contact our leasing office for more information about our Pet Policy.
